website_summaries.verdict: This deep and tall bird cage is an excellent option for housing multiple small birds, as it provides plenty of space for your little pals to flitter, play, and perch.
pros: Perfectly sized for small birds like finches and parakeets
Includes 4 long and smooth wooden perches
Available in green, blue, and brown

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this cage for my 2 parakeets so they would have lots of room and they LOVE it!!! You could fit several parakeets in there, a few cockateils, even small conures or a Quaker or two... it is not a small cage. I just wanted my 2 loves to have lots of room. The perches are awesome as well as the dishes. They come with guards to keep the seeds in and the birds out of the water. I can put several swings in the cage, and toys... it is just an awesome cage. It is well made and not overly heavy. I even hung it from a hook in the ceiling in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was a good value, so I bought it and it's fine
customer_reviews.text: Cockatiel seems to like it, so there's that. Rudimentary construction, but sturdy. Easy to put together. I looked around and this seemed to be the best value in this size (it's a large cage). Mine didn't come with instructions and I put it together before I realized that I needed to lift the tray out and slide it into the bottom. If you pay attention, unlike me, you won't have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Hard T. PleaseTop Contributor: Hydroponics

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our conure!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage for our maroon bellied conure! We had her in a round hanging one but I felt bad because it was very small - this is very spacious, looks very nice and the price is great! The only thing I would say is, although it is supposed to be able to be hung by the handle that's on top, I think the cage is too heavy to have it hang from it, so I bought some chain and some carabiner clips so that I could hang it from all 4 corners of the top.
customer_reviews.author: whwerb

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, big cage and if it were deeper from front to back I probably would have kept it. The description says 14 inches but in reality that includes the outside edge of the base, so inside the cage you actually have only 13 inches front to back. It just seemed to be a tight space to me. For parakeets or other small birds that's probably fine. I have two parakeets and a cockatiel and I would not put the cockatiel in this cage. I did end up sending it back and getting something deeper that I'm much happier with.
customer_reviews.author: CAfarmgirlTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Bargain price
customer_reviews.text: I always read reviews before ordering and what I read were all over the place with this cage but for the price it was worth a gamble. It arrived earlier than estimated and everything was in perfect condition and a breeze to assemble. No tools required. I've had birds for years. Right now I have an African Grey and Cockatiel. This cage is for the Cockatiel. The birds have their own bedroom and fly freely so I didn't really need a flight cage but it was time to replace his old one and size-wise it was a big upgrade. No cons. Can't beat the price in a pet store.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: An Absolutely Amazing Value
customer_reviews.text: My teen daughter is receiving two parakeets for her birthday. We wanted to get the cage in advance and have it all set up for their arrival. We bought a cage at the pet store, but after assembling it, the cage seemed too small for more than one bird. That cage was returned and I bought the Prevue Hendryx Flight Cage. This is VERY roomy, easily three times the size of the previous cage and assembly wasn't too difficult. Best yet, I have purchased a by far superior cage for only $18 dollars more than the one I got at the pet store. I would have bought this cage at twice the price. You certainly won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Ubaldo

customer_reviews.title: Spacious
customer_reviews.text: My little parakeet who is 5 years old needed to graduate to a new big and spacious home & this is it. Cutie Pie has been in this cage for 2 days and she is getting used to her new home which is 3x bigger than what she had. Why change her home now? Well, I feel she needed more space to fly around. It is easy to asseble & light weight that it is easy to move from room to room but it does shake a bit upon movement. It's not flimsy but sturdy and safe. I hope cutie pie gets used to her new home soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend this cage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my 5 parakeets they love the new cage the color black and brown is very nice
customer_reviews.author: Diego Ch

customer_reviews.title: Definitely A mansion
customer_reviews.text: This cage is awesome. Ive never seen a cage this large before and my birds love it. It is also very sturdy and well constructed Do not hesitate to buy this for your birdies
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Large, but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: The cage has plenty of room by height and width but it is not very deep which seems to "cramp" the birds. Once it is put together, the cage feels very flimsy and it is not that strong. The food cups are sturdy but small. Also, being placed at the bottom of the cage means that they catch everything the birds drop. Over all, it's an OK cage for a temporary fix but for a long term home, I would not recommend it. Do not put anything larger than a cockatiel in this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: It’s huuugee!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this cage this week, so far: This cage is huge. As other reviewers said, bigger than it seems. Easy to assemble. A bit wobbly and not as sturdy as it should be for the height. The vertical bars are hard for the birds to climb, there are horizontals on the side though. The cage has two huge doors and it makes it hard to put things in cage without the birds escaping. Needs food cup doors on top as well. Yes, food cups are a bit flimsy. The blue doesn’t really match my decor, but I don’t like black cage bars so I had to get blue.
customer_reviews.author: Bklyn Lil

customer_reviews.title: A spacious home for my parakeet.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is currently housing one(1) parakeet, and she has plenty of room to fly, play and explore. The taller size makes it easy to swap out toys in different areas, keeping the cage lively. The one complaint I'd have is that it is a bit difficult to fully clean without fully dismantling. The poop-catcher tray at the bottom does not line up too well with the actual base of the cage, so a lot of crud falls between the cracks and isn't caught. Not a major complaint, but something to keep in mind before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Joscelyn

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cage !
customer_reviews.text: I resisted getting flight cage for our two parakeets for a long time, not wanting to spend hundreds of dollars on a large one. This one was $66, and is great. The birds love it, with room for all their toys inside. Assembly took about an hour and lots of patience getting all the tabs to fit right. A good needle nose pliers was very helpful in levering the tabs together, then bending them to lock. An equivalent cage from a pet shop would have been much more money...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsier than I hoped, but not bad otherwise
customer_reviews.text: The cage is very roomy, but the wires are thin enough that I wouldn't want to have to move it around much -- I don't think it could take a lot of handling. You get what you pay for, I guess. It's easy enough to clean. I have one budgie in it with two rope perches and some small cement ones. The bars sag a little from the cement perches (which are about 4 in. long), and I wouldn't put larger ones in there. The budgie loves the room, though. I needed a new cage quickly and this will do for now for sure, but I'm going to switch up for something sturdier when I get the opportunity.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L.

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy but great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I use this cage for my Quaker Parrot. We have lots of toys that hang from the side of the cage, and she is quite strong. So, the bars do tend to come loose sometimes. Still, at the price I can afford to just replace one when she breaks it. They tend to last 1-2 years. I like that you can break it down into one story. When we travel she uses the one story cage, and it’s much nicer for her to use something familiar when traveling or boarding.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: BIG and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am 69 yo lady and had no trouble putting the cage together. We purchased it for our new cockatiel. It has room for two cockatiels and plenty of toys. I love the two doors for easy access. The doors lock easily. It was delivered on a timely basis. It was well worth the price. I looked for a long time for a suitable cage and I am very pleased with the purchase. My advice: don't get a small, cheap cage. Pay a little extra and but this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G

customer_reviews.title: Strong sturdy cage.
customer_reviews.text: This cage was even better than I had expected. The instructions were provided and easy to read and assemble. I didn't read about the seed and water cups , but finally figured out they were not as I was using them. The are very sturdy plastic with rounded corners and so easy to clean. The hoods can be removed from them. When they come they are upside down in the cups. I am very happy with this cage, however, the size over whelmed me. I was not expecting one so large. My bird seems to like it. I have a parakeet. The price was perfect and a better value than another cage I saw that looked less sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: N. Rupp

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble and not flimsy. I got this for my mom's 2 cockatiels and they have so much space. The white and blue is very pretty and looks great with some colorful accessories. We had family over and everyone commented on how great it looked. My mom lives in an apartment and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: ROMINA WOOD

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the color. But it arrived a bit bend out if shape and the locks on the doors are impossible. One was completely bent and woven through when I took it out of the box and after putting it all together, the doors don't close well. I will have to buy some clips or something. Also the top to the cage has some hangover on one corner. Got it on as best I can. Instructions are useless. Really I would give it 2.5 stars but it won't let me do halves. Not the worse cage, not the best either.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of room!
customer_reviews.text: So over all: lot bigger than I thought the two parakeets that my dad owns lived in a fourth of the size of it for 2 yrs almost bought this set it up today. Huge! And lots room out toys in there ladders what not. But the wooden landings that came with it slide very easily the dont stay put and felt like even though big seems very flimsy but my dad likes it so give it a 4 on his behalf.
customer_reviews.author: Cassy0104

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cage for the money. My two parakeets have a lot of space to play. Also, it was very simple to put together...took about 10 minutes. However, I have had some experience putting together parakeet cages in the past. But really, it is not hard. Update: I just got a cockatiel and another one of these cages. Beautiful cage. Cockatiel loves it. Plenty of room for his big toys and room to play. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Corina 1835

customer_reviews.title: Good size cage
customer_reviews.text: Good size cage. We have two Parakeets in ours , we put the Perches at the top and bottom and left the whole middle clear and they like flying in that area. This company has a stand that goes with this cage we also got that, fits on the stand perfectly, stand also has small wheels makes it easy to move . Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: This cage is definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is huge! I'm 5'3" and with the cage put together and sitting on the floor it comes above my waist! It's well worth the money and gives my 2 parakeets plenty of flying room. Their first cage was small so this is a huge upgrade for them. Definitely could keep 4 parakeets or 2 cockatiels in this cage with no problem. I really like the feeder and waterer that comes with the cage. They are deep and have a top cover.
customer_reviews.author: MarineWife03

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: I really love this cage but unfortunately the perches I got were carved too deep so they are very loose and will not stay put. When my budgies jump around it moves and they have actually fallen down because the perch feel due too being too loose. I would really appreciate it if I could get a replacement pack of perches that actually fit and stay put otherwise i would have given the cage 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: perfect except for....

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but it has changed since the last one I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this bird cage three times. Easy access with both swing out doors is a a very handy feature. I would not hesitate to purchase again. It is easy to put together and overall a nice spacious cage. I purchased the stand that goes with it which is nice for going from room to room. It is not a heavy gauge wire, which works for me. I think three budgies would be the limit if they are able to get out of the cage regularly, if not I would say two budgies.
customer_reviews.author: K417

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage! I use it as a sleeping cage for my 4 cockatiels and it's perfect. Plenty big enough if I do need to shut them in for some reason. I would have given it 5 stars if the feeders didn't totally suck and they were placed at the top of the cage instead of the bottom. I just switched them out with no mess feeders. I also replaced the smooth dowels for tiel safe tree branches.
customer_reviews.author: Youknowmyname57

customer_reviews.title: A BIT HEAVY FOR AN ELDERLY PERSON
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two parakeets ,this cage is a great buy, spacious well built and easy to assemble,I didn't even need the instructions,Will recommend to anyone who has birds and need space . The price is worth it. I am a HAPPY customer.
customer_reviews.author: Giselle P.

customer_reviews.title: Prevue Pet Products Flight Cage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage for my two little finches and it is absolutely perfect. Easy to put together, easy to clean and lots of flight room for my little birds. I bought the stand to go with it and it is perfect. Just the right height for me to be able to easy reach in the cage and to be able to see my little birds playing and flying. I HIGHLY recommend this cage to anyone wanting a beautiful, good quality home for their little birds.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Best cage for small pet birds!
customer_reviews.text: These are the very best cages for multiple birds. We have our parakeets in one and our finches and diamond doves in another. It gives them plenty of room to play, and to test their wings. The only other thing I do, is to zip tie everything together in case it is knocked down. We have cats that like to scale the cages, and by zip tieing them I know there will be no escapes or accidents. They are also zip tied securely to where they sit. I highly recommend these cages!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cage for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for the price, after you assemble it I would recommend putting a bunch of small zip ties to add to sturdiness. If you plan to hang this you must add the zip ties I would not trust it without specially for hanging. If you are setting it on something you wont need zip ties I just wanted to be able to move whenever without worrying about it.
customer_reviews.author: TheGreenfarmboy

customer_reviews.title: Good cage but a bit unsteady
customer_reviews.text: This bird cage was very easy to assemble with very clear and easy to understand directions. The cage itself seemed a bit unsteady sitting on the table, as if it would be easy to tip over. I used a screw and some gardening wire to secure the top of the cage to the wall, so that it is more sturdy. Overall I like this cage, although I wish it was more than 14” deep.
customer_reviews.author: Generic Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage, but gave mine only 3 stars as ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage, but gave mine only 3 stars as the cage was warped, causing me to use a pad of sticky notes to level it and therefore the bottom grate inside the cage does not sit level either and wobbles unless I sit a bathing dish on bottom to stabalize
customer_reviews.author: desertskydreaming

customer_reviews.title: Great cage. Love size
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and dimensions. My parakeet has plenty of room to flap wings and fly from bottom. Not overcrowded with a few toys. Easy to assemble. Feels like it may not be sturdy when assembling but it is. Not for large parrots. But Pet Prevue has the Best customer service. Very impressed. Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: Shadowrider

customer_reviews.title: Nice and big for single lovebird
customer_reviews.text: Of all the cages I have bought, this was by far the easiest to put together. It’s a pretty good size. Bought for my very active lovebird to have some flying and climbing room. It is a bit flimsy, definitely for smaller birds. But man you can’t beat the price for the size of it.( Bavmorda is too aggressive to be housed with other birds)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this bird cage!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bird cage! It is so attractive and easy to keep clean. My 7 parakeets are having so much fun in it. I am recommending it to my many bird-owning friends. My reason for buying it was the 4 doors, two on top and top on the bottom. I can easily put my hand in and remove or add food or a bird without letting all of them out at one time. Birds love to have room to play. Sitting on my card table it comes to over an adult's head.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmabirdy

customer_reviews.title: Good product for parakeets
customer_reviews.text: I fit 3 parakeets in here, you might be able to get away with 4 but maybe not. 3 is probably good! It's really sturdy, and easy to assemble but some might need a partner. A very nice blue and white cage that my birdies seem like they love. One bad thing is, it's hard to clean but, that's because of it's shape. I suggest cleaning it in a shower or bathtub or outside if you can and NOT a kitchen or bathroom sink. Otherwise! Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: For This Price, A Piece Should Not Be Missing
customer_reviews.text: The clasp that closes the lower door was missing from the package, and for this price, I shouldn't have to improvise with a paper clip. The point of the bird cage is that the little guys don't get out. Hence: the clasp for the door.
customer_reviews.author: Profesora

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for parakeets!
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed flimsy before putting it together. Once assembled, seems to be pretty sturdy, other than the bars bending when you're attempting to attach things like a perch. So far my two parakeets are only sitting at the top half. From the photo, you can see how humongous this thing really is! You could probably fit several parakeets in this thing and never feel crowded.
customer_reviews.author: nicole morn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This bird cage is Beautiful and a wonderful new home for my two parakeets. On day two, both birds greeted me with their Happy Dance (back and forth on the top perch). It was something I never saw our ten year old Sunny do! They love all the different levels and I appreciate the ease of reaching in the cage and the quality of the perches and feeding dishes. It is a snap to assemble and a Great new home for Sunny and Roy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great until a raccoon knocked it over and my birds flew away
customer_reviews.text: It's a huge cage with a lot of space for my birds. I only recommend it for inside unless you make extra modifications. Some animal (raccoon I think) jumped onto my cage at night and made it fall from the table. The top separated from the bottom and my birds flew away. I have to modify this so that it's sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for a smaller bird
customer_reviews.text: This cage is great and lightweight for my cockatiel. He doesn't chew on bars so I don't know how it would fair if he did. The cage suits his needs great. He loves climbing up and down and this cage gives him multiple opportunities to do so. I also appreciate that there are multiple doors for easy access. I wouldn't recommend this cage for a larger or hyper bird. Even if your bird is just an escape artist, I can imagine escape would be easy. For my birds everday needs this cage works great and you cant beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: bars are kind of thin and bend rather easily cage is a nice size and I think a good deal for the price One of my bars were broken when I took it out of the box but it was on the side so not too bad comes with 4 perches which is nice Overall happy with the purchase and would reccomend
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for a small to medium size bird. Easy to assemble, took me about 5 minutes. Easy to clean, bottom drawer slides out . Comes with two dishes that are a bit small, but are fine for my parrotlet. I just put an extra food dish in for treats. Spacious enough that my bird has plenty of room to move around, fly and get enough exercise. I am overall pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Good for tiny birds uwu
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good cage that I use for my two budgies. You can fit some good toys in there, and I use just fillings from my old rats cage at the bottom. I recommend it if you’re looking for something that’ll hold about 3 parakeets. I’d recommend something larger for more than three. You could also fit one medium sized one, but I feel like you should get a more squared one for a bird like a conure or cockatiel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cage, great price, sturdy and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy cage, my cockatiels were not able to bend or scratch the bars, and the price is very affordable. Include bowls for food and water, and perches for birds to sit on. My cockatiels love to climb the bars, and the slide bottom has been very easy for cleaning. My only complain is that it takes a lot of strength to bend the bars to assemble, and also the perches were a little loose so it moves a bit. But other than those minor stuff, great product/
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wild baby bird we are rehabilitating. The larger cage space gives it room to practice hopping perching and flying. Lots of space. Easy to assemble but it did require a flathead screwdriver to pry together some of the hooks. The double doors make cleaning very easy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Works very well
customer_reviews.text: This cage was home to my parakeet for over a year. It worked very well and offered plenty of space for him. A couple of the bars on the roof broke off and the bars bend easily, so it might not work for a bird that wants to escape or has a stronger beak/claws.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, took 5 min. BEST CAGE, HUGE, AND WHAT A DEAL! Highly recommend, parakeet fanatic here! Really glad did not buy the vision cage, this is way better, can do more with it too! THANK you
customer_reviews.author: B.d.art

customer_reviews.title: great size for my birds
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage! It's roomy for my two parakeets. I only use two of the perches they give and use the dishes for their treats. The cage has vertical and horizontal wires making it easy to clip toys or a water bowl. I would definitely recommend this cage! Prevue also has a cage stand which I mount the cage on.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage consider my suggestions
customer_reviews.text: The cage is very nice with a couple of exceptions. The feed/water cups are way too small probably made for a hummingbird. I assembled the cage with very small zip ties instead of bending the tabs over. It remains portable if you need to pack it up.
customer_reviews.author: david jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Received Filthy Cage
customer_reviews.text: Received what was supposed to be a brand-new cage with odd smudges on the bottom that appears to be feces. Contacted Amazon and they refused to refund or replace. The cage is well built and the perfect size for my birds, but the way I received it was really unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: JupiterMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great price on a well constructed, large cage!  Parakeet loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We had purchased a cage at our local PetSmart for my son's parakeet. After using it for about 5 months, his bird started escaping. We found a loose wire that was missing a weld point. I tried to return the cage but without success. We found this cage for about $10 cheaper and it is atleast triple the size of his first cage. It was extremely easy to assemble, the wires are closer together, and even though it is tall, it is still sturdy. His bird has much more room. Aesthetically this cage is more pleasing to our décor than the white and baby blue cage we had purchased before. Would highly recommend this cage!
customer_reviews.author: Kyla Beaver

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage, but . .
customer_reviews.text: I gave three stars because it was well-made, but it was not deep enough. Though the height was nice, I realized as I looked up at my ceiling that I am much more comfortable with lower ceiling, and wider room; taller ceiling with very little width -- no! I just felt my two parakeets would be too cramped. I returned it, and did get full refund in reasonable amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Perez

customer_reviews.title: Birds approve!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't to hard to put together however the top part would have been easier with two people. It's a NICE bigger cage. My parakeets-budgies are loving it! Love the black and tan colors. Feed cups have covered tops and are easily taken out for filling/cleaning which is a plus as well. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Goatgal

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my Green Cheeks previous cage. It's a great size and she has more than enough room to do as she pleases. Easy to put together and it came with some covered food and water dishes that are made of a thicker plastic than most of the cheapie dishes included with cages so that was an added bonus
customer_reviews.author: Lisa T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this cage. Bought this as a secondary cage for my fiance's house. I put it together very easily, took under 5 minutes. It's very roomy inside too! I have 2 cockatiels in the cage and they still have plently of room and can open their wings fully.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Babyak

customer_reviews.title: The parakeet likes it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend. The pieces has to be tie wrapped in several places where there were gaps and it didn't fit snugly together. One of the perches kept falling down so it couldn't be used. Of course the parakeet doesn't know any of that and she likes the new bigger cage. I gave it 3 stars because I'm the one who paid for it and I expect a perfect product no matter how much it costs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage
customer_reviews.text: I like that this cage has two hinged doors to access the top and bottom of the cage. Sometimes it is necessary to take your feathered friend out and because of this feature i feel like this offers safe accessibility. We've owned this cage for so long and we have loved it ever since.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This cage was so easy to set-up out of the box. One of the bars was bent right out of the box, but nothing major that affected the overall setup or integrity of the cage. It comes with two wooden dowels for and two plastic cups for food and water. My biggest gripe (which applies to most bird cages) is that the bottom tray isn't a perfect rectangle, so papering the tray is always a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good cage for the money
customer_reviews.text: This brand's cages aren't the best on the market, but it's hard to beat that price for a cage of this size. It's not the most sturdy, but I only have 2 parakeets so the lack of sturdiness isn't an issue. Larger birds might ruin it, but I can't say. I think it's a great cage for small birds like parakeets, it gives them plenty of room to move around and will contain then well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sapphire

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage for the price. Perfect for small birds like budgies or love birds. My only complaint is that the bottom tray can be hard to slide out which means I end up making a mess when trying to change out the dirty paper at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: M.W.

customer_reviews.title: This cage is PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: I got this today (very fast shipping, thank you!) my three keets are really enjoying the room they have. They went from a 30Lx18Wx18H flight cage to this. They love it, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Jammer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This cage would easily accommodate several parakeets. It only has 2 cups. Seed, and water. Have a cage 1/2 the size of this one that has 4 cups. The large doors are cumbersome to open and close. The wood dowels are cut too long, and extend outside the cage. I hate returning things, however I will likely package it all up and send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Ryan

customer_reviews.title: good cage
customer_reviews.text: By mistake I bought black painted. White painted would look brighter in the room. The ill fitting plastic tray does not slide out smoothly but it services. My kid put it together so the assembly is fairly easy. The big doors on top and bottom are very good and the lovebirds can't open them. Holds a lot of perches and toys.
customer_reviews.author: ventingisok

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, nice open design
customer_reviews.text: I had previously bought a pervue cage, and it was a nightmare to assemble. Thankfully, this one has no such issues. Easy assembly, nice open design, and excellent feeders. My cockatiel is noticeably happier and more energetic since we moved him to this cage: highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: RDJZ

customer_reviews.title: Extremely approved by budgies
customer_reviews.text: I’ll tell you how good my birds loved this cage. In less than two hours being in the new cage theyFelt extremely comfortable enough to do the dirty deed.And even that evening lay an egg in the basket
customer_reviews.author: Nautica Vanity

customer_reviews.title: WELL WORTH THE MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is very big (tall) and roomy. Definitely have to buy more "toys" with all this space! There was conflict with assembling the top to the bottom-it was quite difficult. All the rest was a breeze and is quite heavy. Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: JAY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Nice large bird cage! Assembly was easy and the cage itself is nice and sturdy. Our two parakeets can fly around a bit and have plenty of space. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Will S.

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My, 6, Finch love it & have plenty of space. Just missing the food and water dishes it was pose to come with. Its been difficult getting hold of someone at the company to get them.
customer_reviews.author: stacy dixon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It seems a little flimsy at first, but once all the clips are aligned it is sturdy and easy to move and start filling with toys and perches. My birds are loving the space to fly around, and this was 1/3 of the price if other similar models I’d seen locally. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Caroline

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little flimsier than I thought it would be, and putting it together was a little bit of a pain because a lot of the Edge's don't line up quite right, but overall for the money it's not bad. But I would not recommend putting a larger bird in this, but for my two parakeets it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: PaulB

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy Depending On The Type Of Bird
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest quality, but it works fine for my one canary. I'd say it may not be up to standard for birds that chew a lot or use their beaks for climbing, but for one or two canaries or a few finches this cage is good enough. I shopped around before ordering it here, at the time it was the lowest price I could find for this particular cage. Overall a great deal for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good For Cockatiels, Conures, ETC
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to get rid of a cockatiel due to aggression issues, leaving me with my one cockatiel. I was worried about size and height for my bird. He absolutely loves his cage and it could comfortably fit 2-3 cockatiels in here. Would DEFINITELY recommend for conures, lovebirds, Cockateils, etc. I wouldn’t recommend for finches, budgies or anything of the smaller breeds because the two front doors on it are huge and would look to be a good escape route for any little baby. Perfect to carry, perfect to move and would even fit in a carry if needed. 10/10!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy, fine quality
customer_reviews.text: Great cage, large enough for a flock of parakeets (we have 4 in the cage and have no doubt that we could put in another 4 or 6 or...). With a bit of effort it went together very well, straight and sturdy. We did use some zip ties here and there to reinforce the assembly and make carrying it around worry free. We are very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Steve E

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then I thought
customer_reviews.text: Nice cage. I thought the price was a little high until I started pricing bird cages. Its bigger then I imagined lol. Plenty of room and plenty doors to access the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage...my finches love it and so do I!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage. It was easy to put together and is very sturdy. My finches have lots of space to fly around. They are so happy, they have laid eggs. I also purchased the stand and it fits perfectly. It is easy to clean except for the bottom grate. I have not found a good way to clean it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Angie 67

customer_reviews.title: It's huge!!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is wonderful! It's easy to put together easy to clean I have very happy parakeets! Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: An amazing birdcage
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I found this. The best cage I've ever found. Someone knew their birds when they designed this.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Marshall

customer_reviews.title: good rat cage!!
customer_reviews.text: i’m using this cage for my two rats at the moment, and it’s working great!! i like that if you did have a bird they threw in a few perches and two food bowls! if you are using this for rats please zip tie the sliding doors and use binder clips on the biggest doors so you can prevent your rats from getting out!
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Economic Cage
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cage, easy to put together. This cage cost less than a third of a beautiful cage I bought first with wooden sides. My Senegal was eating his way out of that. Here if he eats the dowels, which he is trying to, I can replace them. He is happy in it.
customer_reviews.author: Marguerite

customer_reviews.title: Support Link Doesn't Work - No Bar For Bottom Door
customer_reviews.text: Very frustrating to get the missing bar to close the bottom door of the cage. The support link on Amazon does not work. Would someone at Prevue please send me the bar for the bottom door which was not in the box, so I can close the bottom door of the cage?
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie C.

customer_reviews.title: My bird loves her cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage is pretty big but it’s also pretty awesome my bird loves it
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This cage is a great value for the money. We saw the same cage in the pet store for close to $100.00- Much larger than expected, went together easily by my 14 year old with some light supervision, with more than enough roon for one parakeet plus toys. It could easily house a second parakeet with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made cage
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cage for my parakeet and didn't expect it to be as long as it is. Easy to put together and so well made. Easy to clean and just the right amount doors to access all areas.
customer_reviews.author: P. George

customer_reviews.title: Snap Together With Ease
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage, tall for little finches who like flying and roosting near the top of their cage. It snapped together very easily and was put into use in minutes after we received it.
customer_reviews.author: CGIsackson

customer_reviews.title: So easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: My two birds enjoy this great cage. Very often parakeet owners put their birds in too small a cage. For the cost this was a super buy. :)
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Saint Gelais Fulk

customer_reviews.title: Absolutley agreat cage!
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised. I had read ALL the reviews and decided on this particular cage. This was purchased for my two parakeets. It is four times as big as the cage they were given to me in. This bird cage is very sturdy. The cage went together very easily and I will enjoy watching my birds new freedom for a long time. What a nice cage.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Pieces colors do not match
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a damaged corner. Pieces colors do not match, sides are black, top/bottom are beige. Did not notice it on the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are great, i only thing is hard carry outside for ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price these are great, i only thing is hard carry outside for fresh air. These are tall and roomy, birds love it
customer_reviews.author: PTillie

customer_reviews.title: Houses around 2-3 small birds
customer_reviews.text: This is great for two budgies in my opinion, but I would still get a bigger cage if you can. I would definitely say this cage would be great for small birds as there's a decent amount of room them. Especially finches, I'd say it could house 3 budgies at most. It was fairly easy to build with the intstructions and It's easy to clean when you know what you're doing.
customer_reviews.author: Memory

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for baby blue jays!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cage! Bought it based on reviews and my need it for baby blue jays I am fostering. I love that it is light enough to carry inside and out and still sturdy. Price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia R.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room for my daughters five birds. She loved it! It was easy to assemble,and arrived right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for one or two small birds
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after one of my two parakeets died. I wanted to give him a fresh home. It’s tall and narrow. He never goes to the bottom but he seems happy. It’s not a sturdy cage so in my opinion it’s not for Conures ( I have several) but perfect for parakeet or 2.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than you think!
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge cage! The pictures do not do it justice. Plenty of room for a pair of parakeets or one cockatiel/medium size bird. I wish there were another set of smaller doors on the upper level to put in more food trays and it is a bit flimsy on the top. Otherwise it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cage
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge!! You certainly get your money’s worth with this cage!! Love that the food dishes are covered. My diamond doves love it
customer_reviews.author: J Marcel

customer_reviews.title: My birds like the extra space!
customer_reviews.text: Very spacious cage for my budgies--they love being able to hop and fly around as they please. It's a little on the flimsy side, but I don't have to worry about it too much since they're pretty tiny and aren't going to break free.
customer_reviews.author: snow.mantis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and break down
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a rescue lovebird. Its a good size, just wish it was a little deeper. True to the listed specs though. My feather baby didn't make it, so I took it apart to store.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Toeppe

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't appear too sturdy but is very large
customer_reviews.text: purchased brown and black, received blue and white cage. Doesn't appear too sturdy but is very large!
customer_reviews.author: daisy

customer_reviews.title: It arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It's huge and it would be a really nice cage if it weren't broken at the bottom and the wires were bent in a few places
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking big cage
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking, roomy cage for canaries. Just bought my second one. I like that it is attractive as well as roomy. Easily assembled, too
customer_reviews.author: Eleanor Yellow Springs

product_meta.title: Prevue Hendryx Flight Cage
product_meta.description: Color:Blue/WhitePrevue Pet Products Flight Cage in Blue and White SP42614-3 is designed to house multiple parakeets, canaries or finch. Featuring two large front doors, our Flight Cage includes two hooded plastic cups plus four wood perches. Measuring 26-Inch L, 14-Inch W, 36-Inch H with 1/2-Inch wire spacing this Flight Cage provides plenty of room for your small birds to play.
feature_bullets: Designed to house multiple parakeets, canaries or finch
Two large front doors for easy access to your bird
Plenty of room for your small birds to fly
2 plastic cups and 4 wood perches are included
26-inch long, 14-inch wide, 36-inch high with 1/2-inch wire spacing

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
